sentences.simplifiedText: 这个城市的气象很独特。
sentences.traditionalText: 這個城市的氣象很獨特。
sentences.pinyin: Zhège chéngshì de qìxiàng hěn dútè.
sentences.translation: The meteorological feature of this city is very unique.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于沙漠的独特地理位置，这个城市的气象主要受到干燥和炎热的气候影响。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於沙漠的獨特地理位置，這個城市的氣象主要受到乾燥和炎熱的氣候影響。
sentences.pinyin: Yóuyú shāmò de dútè dìlǐ wèizhì, zhège chéngshì de qìxiàng zhǔyào shòudào gānzào hé yánrè de qìhòu yǐngxiǎng.
sentences.translation: Due to the unique geographical location of the desert, the meteorological features of this city are mainly affected by the dry and hot climate.

sentences.simplifiedText: 随着技术的发展，现代气象学已经不再只是天气预报。
sentences.traditionalText: 隨著技術的發展，現代氣象學已經不再只是天氣預報。
sentences.pinyin: Suízhe jìshù de fāzhǎn, xiàndài qìxiàngxué yǐjīng bùzài zhǐshì tiānqì yùbào.
sentences.translation: With the development of technology, modern meteorology is no longer just weather forecasting.
The ambience here is very good.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我喜欢这个餐厅的气象，让我觉得非常舒适。
sentences.traditionalText: 我喜歡這個餐廳的氣象，讓我覺得非常舒適。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān zhège cāntīng de qìxiàng, ràng wǒ juédé fēicháng shūshì.
sentences.translation: I like the ambience of this restaurant, it makes me feel very comfortable.
